product_name: Michelin Wild Grip'R 2 29er Foldable Tire - 29 x 2.1 / 29 x 2.25
long_description: Tubeless-ready and with a multipurpose tread, this Michelin Wild Grip'R 2 29er foldable mountain bike tire delivers great all-around performance on the trails. Designed for both dry and muddy terrain, crown's tread is arranged to balance performance between grip, transferring rider output and self-cleaning. Tire shoulders feature knobs tuned for consistent, efficient cornering. Single-compound, 63a durometer rubber stikes a great balance between longevity and grip. Recommended tire pressure is 29 - 58 psi. Michelin Wild Grip'R 2 29er foldable mountain bike tires are tubeless-ready (requires sealant, sold separately) and have a 60 tpi casing with folding aramid bead. Please note: tires can be used with tubes for great versatility.
short_description: Tubeless-ready and with a multipurpose tread, this Michelin Wild Grip'R 2 29er foldable mountain bike tire delivers great all-around performance on the trails.
